attributes.action: Support baby rainbow memorial gardens in sandall park Doncaster
attributes.additional_details: The project already has significant backing and is fully funded by local businesses and fundraising with no cost to the council plus gives significant support to families suffering losing babies during and after pregnancy the reason from the council we believe are insufficient and unjustified as the project in scunthorpe has supported so many in there community and won RHS award and voted for community award
attributes.background: Help change the decision of council to not support the community of Doncaster with a colourful positive place of rememberance

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local projects like this are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
